resources.string: Provide Your real name for your identy your name will be used for search
Please provide correct phone no. This information will keep safe
Your blood group need to be accurate. If you do not about it, please contact nearest clinic
Note: You Can not donate blood if you are under weight. Minimum weight for donation required 50 KG.
Defining your gender will let us know bring new features for mothers health care.
Please provide correct address. This information will keep safe
Correct birth date give your best experience with the community. Don not hide it.
Please do not use a model or doll avatar. Please keep faith on yourself you are beautiful too.
